item.title: Project 4:Stocks Market Time Series Analysis
item.description: In this Project I have studied four different random stock for analysing trend ,later also tried prediction on those stocks.For this task I have downloaded following four time series from Yahoo Finance for the period 1st Jan 2018 to 31st Dec 2020. Greggs plc (GRG) Allianz Technology Trust Plc (ATT ) NEXT plc ( NXT ) Just Eat Takeaway.com N.V (JET ) From this downloaded data I have used date and Close column (which indicates closing price of share for corresponding dates) for further processing.
